patthana11.10:4.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:4.2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:4.3: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:4.4: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana11.10:5.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:5.2: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:5.3: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:5.4: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana11.10:6.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:6.2: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:6.3: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:6.4: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana11.10:7.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:7.2: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:7.3: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:7.4: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana11.10:8.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:8.2: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana11.10:8.3: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe … satta.
patthana11.10:9.1: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa, ārammaṇe ekūnapaññāsa … pe … purejāte āsevane aṭṭhacattālīsa … pe … avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
patthana11.10:10.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana11.10:11.1: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa … pe … purejāte aṭṭhacattālīsa, āsevane sattacattālīsa … pe … avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
patthana11.10:12.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
